description: Volcanic magma block with glowing lava veins, cracks, and hot spots - placeholder implementation

base_colors.note: Dark volcanic rock base with reddish tint: cooled magma appearance

primary_noise.note: High frequency for detailed cracks: Math.sin(globalX * 1.2 + globalY * 0.8) * 0.4

secondary_noise.note: Medium frequency for flow patterns: Math.cos(globalX * 0.6 + globalY * 1.1) * 0.3

tertiary_noise.note: Low frequency for large formations: Math.sin((globalX + globalY) * 0.4) * 0.3

light_specks.description: Glowing lava veins and hot spots in magma

color_adjustment.note: Transform dark rock to bright lava glow (orange-red hot spots)

dark_spots.description: Cooled lava patches and deeper cracks

temperature_zones.hot_spots: Light specks represent molten lava at ~1200°C
temperature_zones.warm_base: Base texture represents cooling magma at ~800°C
temperature_zones.cool_spots: Dark spots represent solidified rock at ~400°C

visual_effects.glow: Light specks create glowing lava vein appearance
visual_effects.contrast: High contrast between hot and cool areas
visual_effects.texture: Triple noise creates realistic volcanic rock texture

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate volcanic rock base noise: sin(x*1.2 + y*0.8)*0.4 + cos(x*0.6 + y*1.1)*0.3 + sin((x+y)*0.4)*0.3
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply dark volcanic base: r = 80 + noise*45, g = 40 + noise*30, b = 35 + noise*25
generation_algorithm.step4: Add glowing lava veins at pattern coordinates (+150R, +80G, +20B)
generation_algorithm.step5: Add cooled patches at different pattern coordinates (-25R, -15G, -10B)
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Creates realistic magma appearance with temperature variation
